content.text:
# Juno International Achievement Award

The Juno Award for "International Achievement" was awarded in these following years: 1992, 1997, 1999–2000, 2017–2018, 2022, and 2025 as recognition for international achievement by musicians from Canada. The most recent recipient of this honor is Boi-1da.
